alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 22 at 10:28PM MDT until April 22 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM MDT FOR CENTRAL OGLALA LAKOTA COUNTY... At 1027 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lonesome Valley, or 28 miles north of Pine Ridge, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Manderson, Lonesome Valley, Goose Neck Housing, Thunder Valley, Rockyford, Sharps Corner, Dry Wood Housing and southern Badlands National Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
